title: Beyond Boltzmann–Gibbs statistical mechanics in optical lattices
title_cn: 超越光学格子中的玻尔兹曼–吉布斯统计力学
abstract: Cold atoms in dissipative optical lattices exhibit an unusual transport behaviour that cannot be described within Boltzmann–Gibbs statistical mechanics. New theoretical tools and concepts need thus be developed to account for their observable macroscopic properties. Here we review recent progress achieved in the study of these processes. We emphasize the generality of the findings for a broad class of physical, chemical and biological systems, and discuss open questions and perspectives for future work.

title: Interaction-driven localization in holography
abstract: Interaction-driven charge localization across a quantum phase transition involves a fundamental rearrangement of the low-energy degrees of freedom. This fact challenges weakly interacting quasiparticle descriptions of the physics. The canonical example of such localization is the Mott transition. Here, we present a localization mechanism distinct from ‘Mottness’, which employs strong interactions in an essential way. Our mechanism allows anisotropic localization: phases can arise that are insulating in some directions and metallic in others. The central observation is that localization occurs if an operator that breaks translation invariance, a ‘generalized Umklapp’ operator, becomes relevant in the effective low-energy theory. This does not occur at weak coupling. We realize such localization in a strongly interacting theory described by means of the holographic correspondence. Our model captures key features of metal–insulator transitions including major spectral weight transfer and bad (incoherent) metallic behaviour in the vicinity of the transition. The localized phase has a power law gap in the optical conductivity.
abstract_cn: 相互作用驱动的电荷在量子相变中的局域化涉及低能自由度的基本重新排列。这个事实挑战了对物理学的弱相互作用的准粒子描述。这种本地化的典型示例是Mott过渡。在这里，我们介绍了一种不同于＆＃8216; Mottness＆＃8217;的本地化机制，该机制以必不可少的方式采用了强大的交互作用。我们的机制允许各向异性的局域化：在某些方向上可能会发生绝缘，而在其他方向上可能会发生金属相。中心观察结果是，如果打破平移不变性的运算符（广义Umklapp＆＃8217;算子，在有效的低能理论中变得重要。这在弱耦合时不会发生。我们在通过全息对应描述的强烈相互作用的理论中实现了这种定位。我们的模型捕获了金属绝缘体跃迁的关键特征，包括主要的光谱重量传递和跃迁附近的不良（非相干）金属行为。局域相在光导率上具有幂律缺口。

title: Spontaneous creation of Kibble–Zurek solitons in a Bose–Einstein condensate
title_cn: 在Bose-Einstein冷凝物中自发产生Kibble-Zurek孤子
abstract: When a system crosses a second-order phase transition on a finite timescale, spontaneous symmetry breaking can cause the development of domains with independent order parameters, which then grow and approach each other creating boundary defects. This is known as the Kibble–Zurek mechanism. Originally introduced in cosmology, it applies to both classical and quantum phase transitions, in a wide variety of physical systems. Here we report on the spontaneous creation of solitons in Bose–Einstein condensates through the Kibble–Zurek mechanism. We measure the power-law dependence of defect number on the quench time, and show that lower atomic densities enhance defect formation. These results provide a promising test bed for the determination of critical exponents in Bose–Einstein condensates.
abstract_cn: 当系统在有限的时间尺度上跨越二阶相变时，自发的对称性破坏会导致具有独立阶数参数的畴的发展，然后它们相互增长并相互靠近，从而产生边界缺陷。 这就是所谓的Kibble＆＃8211; Zurek机制。 它最初是在宇宙学中引入的，它适用于多种物理系统中的经典相变和量子相变。 在这里，我们报告了通过Kibble＆＃8211; Zurek机制在玻色-爱因斯坦凝聚物中自发产生孤子的过程。 我们测量了缺陷数对淬火时间的幂律依赖性，并表明较低的原子密度会增强缺陷的形成。 这些结果为确定Bose爱因斯坦冷凝物中的关键指数提供了有希望的测试平台。

title: Control of the metal–insulator transition in vanadium dioxide by modifying orbital occupancy
title_cn: 通过改变轨道占有率来控制二氧化钒中金属-绝缘体的转变
abstract: External control of the conductivity of correlated oxides is one of the most promising schemes for realizing energy-efficient electronic devices. Vanadium dioxide (VO2), an archetypal correlated oxide compound, undergoes a temperature-driven metal–insulator transition near room temperature with a concomitant change in crystal symmetry. Here, we show that the metal–insulator transition temperature of thin VO2(001) films can be changed continuously from ∼285 to ∼345 K by varying the thickness of the RuO2 buffer layer (resulting in different epitaxial strains). Using strain-, polarization- and temperature-dependent X-ray absorption spectroscopy, in combination with X-ray diffraction and electronic transport measurements, we demonstrate that the transition temperature and the structural distortion across the transition depend on the orbital occupancy in the metallic state. Our findings open up the possibility of controlling the conductivity in atomically thin VO2 layers by manipulating the orbital occupancy by, for example, heterostructural engineering.
abstract_cn: 外部控制相关氧化物的电导率是实现节能电子设备最有希望的方案之一。原型相关的氧化物化合物二氧化钒（VO <sub> 2 </ sub>）在室温附近经历温度驱动的金属绝缘体转变，并伴随晶体对称性变化。在这里，我们表明，可以通过改变VO <sub> 2 </ sub>（001）薄膜的金属绝缘体转变温度从＆＃8764; 285连续更改为＆＃8764; 345＆＃8201; K RuO <sub> 2 </ sub>缓冲层的厚度（导致不同的外延应变）。使用依赖于应变，偏振和温度的X射线吸收光谱，结合X射线衍射和电子传输测量，我们证明了转变温度和整个转变过程中的结构变形取决于金属态下的轨道占有率。我们的发现打开了通过例如异质结构工程操纵轨道占有率来控制原子薄VO <sub> 2 </ sub>层中电导率的可能性。</ p>

title: The extreme vulnerability of interdependent spatially embedded networks
title_cn: 相互依赖的空间嵌入式网络的极端脆弱性
abstract: Recent studies show that in interdependent networks a very small failure in one network may lead to catastrophic consequences. Above a critical fraction of interdependent nodes, even a single node failure can invoke cascading failures that may abruptly fragment the system, whereas below this critical dependency a failure of a few nodes leads only to a small amount of damage to the system. So far, research has focused on interdependent random networks without space limitations. However, many real systems, such as power grids and the Internet, are not random but are spatially embedded. Here we analytically and numerically study the stability of interdependent spatially embedded networks modelled as lattice networks. Surprisingly, we find that in lattice systems, in contrast to non-embedded systems, there is no critical dependency and any small fraction of interdependent nodes leads to an abrupt collapse. We show that this extreme vulnerability of very weakly coupled lattices is a consequence of the critical exponent describing the percolation transition of a single lattice.
abstract_cn: 最近的研究表明，在相互依赖的网络中，一个网络中很小的故障可能会导致灾难性的后果。在相互依赖的节点的关键部分之上，即使是单个节点故障也可能引发级联故障，这可能会突然使系统崩溃，而在此关键依赖性以下，少数节点的故障只会导致对系统的少量损害。到目前为止，研究集中在没有空间限制的相互依存的随机网络上。但是，许多实际系统（例如电网和Internet）不是随机的，而是在空间上嵌入的。在这里，我们分析和数值研究建模为晶格网络的相互依赖的空间嵌入网络的稳定性。出乎意料的是，我们发现在晶格系统中，与非嵌入式系统相比，没有关键的依赖关系，并且任何小部分的相互依赖的节点都会导致突然崩溃。我们表明，极弱耦合晶格的这种极端脆弱性是描述单个晶格渗流转变的临界指数的结果。

title: Universality in network dynamics
abstract: Despite significant advances in characterizing the structural properties of complex networks, a mathematical framework that uncovers the universal properties of the interplay between the topology and the dynamics of complex systems continues to elude us. Here we develop a self-consistent theory of dynamical perturbations in complex systems, allowing us to systematically separate the contribution of the network topology and dynamics. The formalism covers a broad range of steady-state dynamical processes and offers testable predictions regarding the system’s response to perturbations and the development of correlations. It predicts several distinct universality classes whose characteristics can be derived directly from the continuum equation governing the system’s dynamics and which are validated on several canonical network-based dynamical systems, from biochemical dynamics to epidemic spreading. Finally, we collect experimental data pertaining to social and biological systems, demonstrating that we can accurately uncover their universality class even in the absence of an appropriate continuum theory that governs the system’s dynamics.
abstract_cn: 尽管在表征复杂网络的结构特性方面取得了重大进展，但是揭示拓扑和复杂系统动力学之间相互作用的通用属性的数学框架仍在继续困扰着我们。在这里，我们建立了复杂系统中动态扰动的自洽理论，使我们能够系统地分离网络拓扑和动力学的贡献。形式主义涵盖了广泛的稳态动力学过程，并提供了有关系统对摄动和相关性发展的响应的可检验的预测。它预测了几个不同的通用类，这些类的特征可以直接从控制系统动力学的连续方程得出，并在从生化动力学到流行病传播的几种基于规范网络的动力学系统上得到验证。最后，我们收集了与社会和生物系统有关的实验数据，表明即使在没有适当的连续统理论来控制系统动力学的情况下，我们也可以准确地揭示它们的普遍性类别。
